name: Lodingglue
bio: Unreadable Code? More like real-time obfuscation.

name: BeestoXd
bio: Breaks things, then fixes them in a way that no one understands. Probably runs on caffeine.

name: Mostafizur Rahman
bio: Built this site, broke it a few times, then somehow made it work. If something's wrong, he’s already fixing it… or pretending he doesn’t see it.
easterEgg: Once coded for 72 hours straight and started having full conversations with his rubber duck.

name: AYAAN MCPE
bio: Sleeps once every update cycle. Makes things work when they really shouldn’t.

name: FARIZ MCPE
bio: Either solving a bug or creating one—there is no in-between.

name: Xzyyy
bio: Writes backend code so solid it probably qualifies as a security vault.

name: Lisa
bio: Turns ugly UIs into sleek masterpieces. Still waiting for dark mode on everything.

name: Aidgods
bio: Writes code, breaks things, fixes them, then acts like it was all part of the plan.

name: ExocubeYT
bio: Builds things that make people go 'woah.' Occasionally forgets to sleep.
